concept.title: Link - Hovers
concept.shortdesc: How hovers work with the Eclipse Plugin

section.p: If your Links paths are configured correctly within your Eclipse environment, then hovers will be enabled. The hover will locate the linked file and show the section of the file where the keys match. The linked file can be quickly edited by pressing the icon in the button bar at the bottom left of the hover.
